thread.title: cPanel & WHM 11.52 Now in RELEASE Tier
thread.title_full: cPanel & WHM 11.52 Now in RELEASE Tier

author: Lindsey Stirneman
title: cPanel & WHM 11.52 Now in RELEASE Tier
text:
cPanel, Inc. is thrilled to release cPanel & WHM software version 11.52, which is now available in the RELEASE tier. cPanel & WHM 11.52 offers faster server installation, EasyApache 4 with multi-PHP, calendar invitations, and more.
Faster server installation
cPanel & WHM software version 11.52 introduces our redesigned installer, which precompiles Apache and PHP. We’ve also added a new mirroring capability.
EasyApache 4
Our latest iteration of EasyApache makes its debut in 11.52. We’ve stocked EasyApache 4 with binary RPMs, automatic updates, and standard package management tools.
Multi-PHP management and editing
As part of EasyApache 4, we’ve enabled hosting providers to install multiple versions of PHP on their servers. Our multi-PHP tools provide different levels of configuration and modification.
Calendar invitations
With the arrival of 11.52, a shared address book, populated with same-domain email addresses, a free/busy service, and cross-domain invites expand cPanel & WHM’s calendar functionality.
Detailed information on all cPanel & WHM 11.46 features can be found at https://documentation.cpanel.net . An overview of the latest features and benefits is also available at http://releases.cpanel.com .
To ensure that you receive up-to-date product news from cPanel, we encourage you to subscribe to the “Security Advisories and Product Release Announcements” mailing list at http://cpanel.com/mailing-lists .
About cPanel, Inc.
Since 1997, cPanel, Inc. has been delivering the web hosting industry’s most reliable, intuitive control panel. The robust automation software helps businesses thrive and allows them to focus on more important things. Customers and partners receive first-class support and a rich feature set, making cPanel & WHM the hosting platform of choice. http://cpanel.com .
